description: fragm. of vol. 2; on fol. 5b the beginning of abwāb al-farāʻiḍ (= ed. Cairo, 1934, vol. 8, p. 239). ff. 54. 244 x 168; 210 x 130 mm. 21 lin. Maghribi. Damascus, 516 H., Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī; on last fol. samāʻ dat. 616 H. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 169 (I); SI, 268.
